metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0599 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.9 allows remote authenticatedusers to affect availability via unknown vectors related to Optimizer.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
